recipes.name: Chicken & Rice Casserole
recipes.author: Merrily Seely
ingredients: 2 cans of cream of chicken soup
recipes.procedure:
Place rice in large pot.  Add 4 c. water & 1 tsp. salt.  Bring to a boil.  Reduce heat to low.  Cook for 20 minutes.  Sauté onion in butter.  Cube chicken or turkey.  Mix all ingredients together, adding milk last as needed to moisten.  Place in a greased 9” X 13” casserole dish.  Top with:
8 c. crushed Rice Chex cereal
½ c. melted butter
Bake at 350° F for 1 hour uncovered.
